code: import{useAppDispatch,useAppSelector}from'../../hooks';import{store}from'../../store';import{setPromoFilmStatus}from'../../store/action';import{addFilmStatusAction}from'../../store/api-action';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MyListButtonPromo(){var dispatch=useAppDispatch();var promoFilm=useAppSelector(function(state){return state.promoFilm;});var clickMyListButton=function clickMyListButton(){var data={id:promoFilm.id,status:Number(!promoFilm.isFavorite)};dispatch(setPromoFilmStatus(!!data.status));store.dispatch(addFilmStatusAction(data));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return clickMyListButton();},className:"btn btn--list film-card__button",type:"button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("svg",{viewBox:"0 0 19 20",width:"19",height:"20",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("use",{xlinkHref:promoFilm.isFavorite?'#in-list':'#add'})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"My list"})]});}export default MyListButtonPromo;
